title: Girls' Jacket - Aquamarine
desc: The Legacy reversible Jacket from Turbine Outerwear offers 160g insulation, has 10,000mm WPB coated poly-dobby fabric as well as a durable water repellent treatment. A sure thing to help keep your little ones warm as they play in our winter wonderland.

title: Kids' Snow Pants
desc: The Rodeo kids pant from Turbine outerwear come fully lined with poly-taffeta and have a 120g of insulation, 10,000mm WPB coated polyester-matte fabric and has a durable water repellent treatment. These pants are a great way to help keep the kids warm and dry as the play all day in Colorado's winter playground.
